title: Ep. - 196 - DIRECTOR AND CHOREOGRAPHER MIKEY MINDEN  DIRECTOR PAIGE GOLDBERG TOLMACH
description:
Mikey Minden is a director, choreographer, and image curator who has been featured on several reality shows including Pussycat Dolls presents: The Search for the Next Doll, “The Real Housewives of Orange County,” MTV’s Dancelife, Keeping up with the Kardashians, Dance Moms and currently on “The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills”.


The 1979 class of Porter Gaud School in Charleston, South Carolina graduated 49 boys. Within the last 35 years, six of them have committed suicide. Director Paige Goldberg Tolmach uncovers how the school’s beloved teacher and coach Eddie Fischer was a sexual predator who preyed upon young boys.


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

Patron: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca
